title: Uniq Enumeration Event
description: Object representation for for a single uniq enumeration

name.description: Friendly name for the uniq, if known

possible_values.description: List of possible enumerated values for the uniq

units.description: Current or default unit for this uniq

type.description: Current or default type for this uniq

ref.description: Reference parameter for this uniq (e.g. BACnet object)

writable.description: Indicates if this uniq is writable or not
